name: String 'Em Up
description:
Catch yourself some dinner and weave a masterpiece doing it.

Controls ActionXboxPSKeyboardMoveLeft Stick
Left StickWSAD or Arrows
Jump and trail web
AXSpacebarRestart game


RQuit game


Escape

Hold the direction along a surface you're touching to walk on it.

To jump through the string you're standing on: hold the direction through the string and then Jump.

Credits

Design and Program: Iori Branford

Art: opengameart.org

Sound: freesound.org
